setup_commands: micromamba install -n starcoder_env -c conda-forge transformers torch torchvision pytorch-cuda cudatoolkit=11.6
micromamba install -n starcoder_env -c huggingface datasets accelerate huggingface_hub bitsandbytes wandb

commands: micromamba run -n starcoder_env pip install -r requirements.txt

steps.description: No explicit data preparation mentioned, assuming 'data/finetune' is the relevant directory
Fine-tune StarCoder on Stack Exchange instruction dataset
commands: python finetune/finetune.py ... (using the provided command with dataset and other parameters)

steps.description: Evaluate the fine-tuned model using BigCode-Evaluation-Harness
